Missing previews = fail. You can skip them if they're present, but you can't choose to watch them if they're not. Should be viewers' choice, not the group's enforced preference.

Good quality and h264, unlike Zhentarim.

Typesetting and font is fine too.
Simply the best! Same DVD rips as ZX, but positioned properly. Opening doesn't use the official subs though, unlike ZX.
Very detailed and correct, it also didn't have some of the stranger lines other fansubs have
Bad Comments: Only subs I could actually find and download (using XDCC), but has some timing issues.
